reviews_positivos.contenido: Best slime set Iâ€™ve purchased!! Normally slime smells like chemicals and is either to sticky or to stiff. But this set is GREAT!! Each smile smells like strawberry shortcake, the 3 different textures are perfect and the add in charms are so cute! This set of slimes comes with 6 MINI slime colors, 3 different textures and plenty of charm add ins! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!

reviews_positivos.contenido: Super cute quality seems good. Iâ€™m not using as advent calendar but as favors for kids at a Christmas party. I got a box of pink and blue. I got little bags to put them in! Good value some smell sorta strong but non have been overly sticky. Lots of cute different charms - albeit some random ones being a Halloween cat slime, gnomes and axolotl but Iâ€™m excited for the kids to get these!

reviews_positivos.contenido: My little girl loves slime but I do not. This was not messy, it did notstick to the floor or stain the countertop. She mixed the colors and saved it in a ziplock bag to play again with later. The small charms were really cute, she even used them as food for her barbies. This had a good variety and the smells were nice and light. Better than slime for our house!
reviews_positivos.fecha: Calificado en Estados Unidos el 13 de enero de 2026
